description: All paintings avalable for order. Digital Copy is $10.00. High quality prints avalable in any custom sizes, ask for details. High quality prints in dark oak frames available in 18" by 24" or in 12" by 16". 18" by 24" frames with prints are $150.00. 12" by 16" frames with prints are $100.00. Prices include tax but do not including shipping.
